title: AccuWeather Platinum v3.3.0.7 [Paid] [APK] [ATOM]
description:
Description:
Stay connected to the latest weather conditions with AccuWeather Platinum. This ad free, customizable app features the new AccuWeather MinuteCastÃ¢â€žÂ¢, the leading minute-by-minute weather forecast, hyper-localized to your exact street address. AccuWeather offers the same Superior AccuracyÃ¢â€žÂ¢ and great experience across all Android smartphones and tablets.


Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	MinuteCast Ã¢â‚¬â€œ minute-by-minute weather forecasts for the next two hours hyper-localized to your exact street address in the United States and Canada. Includes precipitation type and intensity, and start and end times for precipitation.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	For worldwide locations, when AccuWeather forecasts snow, ice, rain, wind, or the probability of thunderstorms, you will see an orange exclamation point displayed within the locationÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s current and 25-day screens.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Push notifications for severe weather alerts in the United States. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Homescreen widget displaying two-day forecasts with severe weather warnings for your GPS location, and a time clock. Resizable, multi-location widgets are also available with even more weather detail. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Radar for all of North America and Europe, and worldwide satellite overlaying interactive Google MapsÃ¢â€žÂ¢ with a snapshot view of the maps for your saved locations. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Current news and weather videos, with many available in both English and Spanish.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Social media sharing so you can share your locationÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s current conditions, hourly, or 25-day forecasts using the social media apps you have on your device.
You also get the accurate, local weather forecasts and the customization you expect from AccuWeather, minus the advertising:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Accurate and local forecasts for nearly 3 million locations worldwide. Forecasts update every 15 minutes with information for the next 25 days Ã¢â‚¬â€œ all in 27 different languages.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Current weather conditions update every 15 minutes with the very latest humidity and precipitation percentages, dew point, visibility, UV index, wind speed gusts and direction, times for sunrise and sunset, and RealFeelÃ‚Â® Ã¢â‚¬â€œ AccuWeatherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s exclusive weather forecasting system that analyzes multiple weather factors to determine how the local temperature actually feels. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Local weather forecast summaries that provide an overview of the next five daysÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ weather forecast along with a description of the most dramatic weather event expected during the five days.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Status bar on the homescreen displaying the current temperature for your current or home location. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Ability to store an unlimited amount of locations. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Choice between metric or imperial units, 12-hour or 24-hour time display, and portrait or landscape view.


What's New:
* Introducing MinuteCast Ã¢â‚¬â€œ minute-by-minute weather forecasts for the next two hours hyper-localized to your exact street address in the United States and Canada.
* The Local Forecast Summary, a brief summary of what you can expect from the weather over the next 3-5 days for your location.
